definition: Manchurian wild ginger (family Asarum)
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
surname Xin

sentences.english: Objective To study the chemical constituents of the root of Asarum heterotropides Fr Schmidt.
sentences.chinese: 目的對遼細辛地下部分進行化學成分研究。

sentences.english: Hubei is one of the distribution centres of Asarum in China.
sentences.chinese: 湖北是我國細辛屬植物的分佈中心之一。

sentences.english: Objective It is to discuss the clinical curative effect of fleabane injection on acute brain infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討燈盞細辛注射液治療急性腦梗死的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the optic neuroprotection components of Erigeron breviscapus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究燈盞細辛視神經保護的活性成分。

sentences.english: The geographical distribution of genus Asarum in Mt. Emei of China in relation to systematics.
sentences.chinese: 峨眉山細辛屬的分佈及其與系統分類的關係。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the analgesic action of combination of asarum decoction and nifedipine .
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察細辛水煎劑與硝苯地平伍用的鎮痛作用。

sentences.english: Asarum clinical widely applies to the many kinds of diseases treatment, also curative effect affirmation.
sentences.chinese: 細辛臨牀廣泛應用於多種疾病的治療，且療效肯定。

sentences.english: In Chinese southward, people have spreaded Asarum grass below the floor board to drive termites.
sentences.chinese: 我國南方將細辛全草鋪於地板下以防白蟻侵蛀。

sentences.english: The geographical distribution of genus Asarum in Mt. Emei of China in relation to system…
sentences.chinese: 文章題目峨眉山細辛屬的分佈及其與系統分類的關係。

definition: dried ginger
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
ephedra (genus Ephedra)
black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
dwarf lilyturf (Ophiopogon japonicus), its tuber used in TCM
radish seed (used in TCM to treat indigestion)
Salvia miltiorrhiza
milk vetch/plant genus Astragalus/huangqi 黃芪|黄芪, Astragalus membranaceus (used in TCM)
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
chebulic myrobalan (Terminalia chebula)
poor man's ginseng (Codonopsis pilosula)/codonopsis root (used in TCM)
ladybell root (Radix adenophorae)
chicken gizzard lining
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
American ginseng (Panax quinquefolius)
